text: Darryl T. Owens (November 10, 1937 â€“ January 4, 2022) was an American politician and lawyer. He was a Democratic Party member of the Kentucky House of Representatives from 2005 to 2019. Owens retired from the House in 2018. Owens died on January 4, 2022, at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Kentucky Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
